title: Node.js: Parse JSON Data
story: JSON is everywhere! Master parsing to unlock data from APIs and config files.
instructions: Read the JSON file '/tmp/data.json', parse it, and print the 'name' property from the parsed object.

hints.text: First read the file with fs.readFileSync(), then use JSON.parse() to convert string to object.
Access the 'name' property with dot notation: data.name
